name: Fave Fluid Ultralight Screen SPF50+
about: What it is:u00a0A broad-spectrum SPF 50+ fluid, so weightless youu2019ll forget youu2019re wearing it, featuring niacinamide and vitamin C to visibly brighten skinu2014Australian made and tested...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dullness, Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Bemotrizinol: A next-generation UVA and UVB filter that is super-efficient and less irritating..- Niacinamide: Absorbs excess oil, improves the look of skin texture, and visibly brightens skin tone..- Vitamin C: Boosts brightness, diminishing the look of dark spots and uneven skin tone...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, oxybenzone, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know:u00a0 Your new favorite is finally here. Ditch tacky, suffocating SPF for an ultra-thin sunscreen fluid that protects and visibly minimizes pores, smooths texture, and brightens...Ultra Violette's 'SKINSCREENS' equal skincare plus sunscreen. Their range is made and tested under the harshest conditions in the world: the Australian sun.
ingredients: -Pentavitin: Is a plant-based ingredient that delivers up to 72 hours of hydration..-Niacinamide: Visibly improves skinu2019s tone and texture while supporting its natural barrier..-Vitamin C: Brightens the appearance of skin and fades visible dark spots..Bemotrizinol 4%, Ensulizole 4%, Avobenzone 3%, Water/Aqua/Eau, Dibutyl Adipate, Alcohol, Polyester-8, Phenyl Trimethicone, Caprylyl Methicone, Propanediol, Acrylates/C12-22 Alkyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Arginine, Niacinamide, Coco-Glucoside, Disodium Lauriminodipropionate Tocopheryl Phosphates, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Citric Acid, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply every day, even when youu2019re staying indoors, as UVA rays pass through clouds and windows..-Smooth on as the final step in your skincare routine, right after your moisturizer and before your makeup.

reviews.review_text: This unfortunately caused a terrible reaction my whole face was covered in bumps for a week. Definitely do a patch test!

reviews.review_text: well, it didnu2019t break me out but the absolute greasy oily finish it has is insane. I have to follow up with a powder to make this useable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! This sunscreen doesnu2019t break me out (which is very rare). It is lightweight and provides a subtle glow. Will 100% repurchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Say goodbye to heavy, sticky sunscreen! This ultra-thin fluid is a game-changeru2014it feels like water on my skin, leaving zero residue and no greasy shine. It gives an invisible finish that doesnu2019t clog pores, so my skin stays smooth, fresh, and naturally radiant. Perfect for normal to combo skin, especially if youu2019re prone to congestion. I love that itu2019s fragrance-free, toou2014just pure, weightless protection. This is hands-down my new SPF favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i finally got my hands on this sunscreen and it suits my sensitive skin very well. itu2019s lightweight and i havenu2019t broken out yet which is a plus for me. it has decent ingredients which adds a layer of skincare as well.

reviews.review_title: Lightweight and Safe for Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is super light and easy to wear, it feels like nothing is on my skin and wears super well with makeup. The high spf is perfect for everyday wear and I've added it into my daily routine. Plus, I have super sensitive skin and have had no reactions to this sunscreen so I would say it's safe for sensitive skin.

This UV product is super light and smooth! It really feels unnoticeable on the skin and provided me with good coverage from the sun. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a less heavy sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge fan of Ultra Violette and this is possibly my favourite sunscreen I've tried from them! It's incredibly lightweight and you don't need a lot. It spreads evenly, makes my skin look soo glowy and healthy, and wears well under makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all this sunscreen is amazing. Because of its invisible finish, without any white cast, I use it as my make up base. Itu2019s so easy to blend. Plus itu2019s very effective in protecting my skin from the sun. I highly recommend this.

This Australian-made and tested sunscreen has been the best addition to my daily skincare routine. It is so lightweight and leaves an invisible finish on the skin with no white cast! It absorbs into the skin quickly and easily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen, it helps with my acne.  It hydrates and nourishes skin and the best part is it is super lightweight. I donu2019t like to put heavy stuff on my face, so I have to use sunscreen that is lightweight. This is perfect, I use it everyday, makes my skin soft and ofcourse it is super hydrating as well.

reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with how lightweight this is! This sunscreen is very easy to blend and soaks effortlessly into the skin. Most importantly, it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. Overall would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this ultra fluid SPF 50+ . It has vitamin C and niacinamide which helps in brightening. It has does not irritate my skin, as usually i am sensitive go certain types of sunscreens but this one works like magic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

Itu2019s not too harsh on my skin and it helps minimize my pores, helps brighten my skin. Itu2019s fragrance free and absorbs well with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I cannot believe this is Australian made and yet leaves 0 whitecast and is ALSO LIGHTWEIGHT ud83dudc8c I simply adore the formula and this is going to be a staple in my routine everyday! It has a silky finish and is fragrance free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love This Ultra Violette Fave Fluid Ultralight Screen SPF50+ because itu2019s super lightweight, smooth and blends in my skin like a serum and give it a very healthy glow and it contains niacinamide and vitamin C to visibly brighten skin and give it a very healthy,smooth look and my makeup looks flawless because itu2019s very hydrating and performs really well underneath makeup.definitely a great addition in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally received my ultraviolet sunscreen and Iu2019m quite impressed, it has such a light weight non greasy feel to it. Love how it just sinks into my skin, almost like itu2019s not even there! If youu2019re not already using sunscreen in your daily skin care routine, you should definitely start. I use it daily during all seasons even winter (the sun is still there even when itu2019s cold). Bonus points for it being made and tested in Australia and cruelty free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fave fluid SPF50+ ultralight skin screen is my new favourite sunscreen. It is so light and blends into my skin so seamlessly and it is invisible. It is Australian made and tested. I use it under my makeup and it as my last step of my morning skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ultraviolette Fave Fluid SPF50+ Ultralight Screen I LOVE this sunscreen! It is super lightweight; you barely notice you are wearing it. It is watery, not thick at all, and absorbs into the skin really quickly. It does not leave a greasy or sticky feeling. This sunscreen is also unscented and gentle on the skin.  I have really dry and sensitive skin and I have not experienced any irritation or redness from using it. I like that it has a high SPF of 50. I need good protection from the sun's harmful rays, and I don't want to go below SPF 50. Since I wear makeup every day, I find this very helpful because it does not interrupt my makeup and skincare routine It leaves a very subtle glow on my skin and my makeup always goes on flawlessly! Ultraviolette is made in Australia with the best ingredients and sold worldwide! The packaging is cute too; the bottle is quite small and easy to carry in a handbag.

reviews.review_title: you guys must use before applying makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I must say this product is awsmm , very lightweight, easy to absorb in your skin, and hydrates your skin very deeply , no white cast left on your skin, i use in my wveryday makeup and skincare routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this! itu2019s super light weight and iu2019ve never seen a sunscreen of this texture before. itu2019s literally like water but because of that it absorbs super fast and doesnu2019t feel greasy. highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Ultra Violette SPF 50+ is a great sunscreen lotion. The packaging is very pretty. The lotion is very lightweight texture. It absorbs well. Not too heavy. Very easy applicator tip to drip on your skin. And it gives a nice glowing finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Ultra Violette SPF 50+ Ultralight Sunscreen is a delight from the land down under, Australian made and tested, and I love how weightless it feels on my skin. It has a silky texture that absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue, which is a huge plus for my combination skin. I appreciate that it gives high UVA and UVB protection without that heavy or sticky feeling some sunscreens can have. It sits well under makeup. The finish is slightly dewy but not shiny, and it didnu2019t clog my pores. I also like that itu2019s fragrance-free, so itu2019s great for sensitive skin days. This has easily become my go-to SPF for daily wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the texture of this sunscreen! It is weightless and really sheer, and it blends so well! I really like how it doesnu2019t make my face feel greasy either, and that it is not too thick. Itu2019s a great addition to a morning skincare routine and I can see myself using this for more outdoor-geared activities. Iu2019ve never tried an Australian-brand sunscreen before so I think it is really cool! My one comment about this is that it is scented, which I donu2019t love, but itu2019s not too bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ultra Violette's Fav Fluid Ultralight Screen is super lightweight and goes on the skin so smooth. The texture is very watery and leaves zero white cast! I use it alone and under my makeup too, it's virtually undetectable. Great addition to my skincare routine and I love the travel friendly packaging!  I'M SO GLAD THIS AUSTRALIAN BRAND IS AVAILABLE AT SEPHORA CANADA!

reviews.review_title: Sunscreen is in all year round!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Ultra Violet Fave Fluid SPF 50 because it is so lightweight, it feels like you have nothing on.  The consistency is like no other SPF I have ever used.  It layers well under makeup and best of all, there is no white casting.  I also love that it's an SPF 50 and it's made and tested under the Australian sun so you know it's heavy duty.  This is a brand I love and trust!  I love everything I've ever tried from Ultra Violet.  Protect your skin all year round with Ultra Violet!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Ultra Violette Fave Fluid SPF is like a super lightweight sunscreen that's really good at protecting your skin from the sun. It's got an SPF of 50+, which is super high, so you can be sure you're protected.  The texture is like a silky fluid that just glides on your skin and absorbs really quickly. It doesn't leave your skin feeling greasy or sticky, which is great. And it's perfect for everyday use, even if you're wearing makeup.  The finish is kind of semi-matte, which is awesome for oily skin like mine. It helps control shine but still keeps your skin looking natural and hydrated.  The best part is that it feels more like a serum than a traditional sunscreen. It's got skin-soothing ingredients and is free of any irritating stuff. So you can feel good about putting it on your face every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second bottle of this sunscreen, and Iu2019ll be repurchasing immediately when I run out. Itu2019s incredibly lightweight, blends immediately and has zero white cast. I love how it primes the skin before makeup - I never have any issues with pilling when I use it. Itu2019s also non-irritating to my eyes, which is a problem for me when I apply some sunscreens under my eyes. I have heard people raving about Ultra Violette sunscreens in the past, and they didnu2019t lie u2013 itu2019s a phenomenal formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who is passionate about protecting their skin, and formulating the perfect routine to meet my skins needs, this is a must to add to your everyday routine. This light weight non-greasy, non-sticky SPF will effortlessly seep into your skin, embracing it. It leaves a beautiful glow, making your skin look fresh and dewy, while protecting it from the sun. This product is seriously amazing. You can even stack up loads of product, and it does not leave any white cast. This Australian based company both made and tested in Australia is a must to add to your collection.

reviews.review_title: This skinscreen is unmatched! One of the best!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Australian find sunscreen is a significant skincare upgrade to any routine! The texture is fluid like water and easily absorbed. itu2019s perfect for someone like me who hates the sticky and tacky feeling of putting SPF. Itu2019s almost invisible which is great for using under make up or layering on top. It gives a silky smooth finish. This skinscreen is seriously a game changer in SPF! Iu2019m loving it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: n amazing product! Goes on so light and smooth without leaving a sticky residue.  Canu2019t wait to add this to my routine to moisturize and protect my skin from the sun! Cannot reccomend this more go get you some!

This sunscreen is my new favourite find! It is so light on the skin it really does feel like you have nothing on and your skin looks so radiant (also there is no white cast, itu2019s truly invisible)!! Been using it everyday lately and will never go back to another brand! Didnu2019t know this Australian brand before but definitely a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the FAVE FLUID SPF 50+ ULTRALIGHT SKINSCREEN every day, and itu2019s quickly become a staple in my routine. The texture is insanely lightweightu2014it feels like water on my skin, which I love. Thereu2019s no heaviness or tacky feeling at all, and it leaves an invisible finish that blends right in. I apply it as the last step in my skincare routine, right after moisturizer, and it sits perfectly under makeup. Plus, knowing itu2019s Australian-made and tested under some of the harshest sun conditions gives me extra confidence that Iu2019m well protected. Itu2019s a must-have for daily SPF!

Leaves no residue or white cast! I love thu00e9 spout on this spf as it allows easy and mess free application . Gives an invisible finish on the skin. Iu2019ve been able to add this into my daily routine and been really enjoying it ! Great for people with normal to oily skin . I would highly recommend this Australian made and tested brand!

Plus, knowing itu2019s Australian-made and tested makes me trust it even more. Perfect for everyday sun protection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great sunscreen. I've been using this sunscreen for a few weeks.  I typically apply this in the morning, it has a nice lightweight texture that quickly absorbs into the skin. It leaves no white cast, which is a plus. I also appreciate that it's Australian made and tested. Definitely a staple product in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ultra Violetteu2019s SPF is so lightweight, it feels like nothing on my skin! The ultralight, weightless fluid texture blends seamlessly, leaving an invisible finish thatu2019s perfect for everyday wear. I use it daily in my skincare routine, and I love that itu2019s Australian-made and tested for trusted sun protection. Highly recommend adding this to your routine!

This product is a game-changer! Itu2019s the perfect blend of skincare and sun protection. I love how lightweight the serum feels on my skinu2014itu2019s like it melts right in without leaving any greasiness or heavy feeling. The soft rose scent is super subtle, making it feel a bit luxurious during my morning routine. What really stands out for me is the glow! It gives this natural, healthy luminosity, which makes it a great base under makeup. Plus, knowing itu2019s protecting my skin from sun damage and preventing fine lines is a huge bonus. Definitely a staple in my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ultra Violette Fave Fluid SPF50+ Ultralight Screen is an Australian made and tested spf. The Fave Fluid is lightweight spf and has a really liquid texture. It surprisingly absorbs quickly. Once absorbed it is easy to apply your makeup. It leaves no white cast which is perfect for my brown skin. Although it is fragrance free, there is a bit of smell at beginning but then it fades away. The packaging is very cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been an amazing addition to my skincare routine. The ultralight weightless fluid texture just feels so amazing on the skin. The best part is that there is no white cast. It has an invisible finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never had the opportunity to use a product made and tested in Australia until now. It's often difficult to find an SPF that doesn't leave a white cast on women of color, but thankfully this one with a bit of rubbing goes away. The applicator is nice but the product does come out fast and runny. The finish leaves the skin tacky, which I wasnu2019t a personal fan of.

reviews.review_title: A big NO for sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: Definitely not for sensitive skin, I really want to like this product,but after a week,it causes me redness and breakouts,and irritated my skin so bad

reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen!! Itu2019s not flaky or visible under my makeup and it has a nice matte finish. I use it everyday and i find it nice thatu2019s itu2019s Australian made! I really recommend it if you want a lightweight sunscreen ud83cudf38

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: super light yet hydrating enough! The combination of niacinamide and vitamine c makes your skin look healthy and glowy! amazing for hyperpigmentation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Australian brand of sunscreen is unmatched for protection, which is amazing. This formula however wasn't a winner for me. It is super light weight but it leaves a tacky finish on the skin. There is no white cast and despite the tacky feel; it sits under makeup quite well. Unfortunately, it exacerbated my rosacea, causing some itching. Overall the brand is great but this formula wasn't for me.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love it, but it just isnt for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted so badly to love this sunscreen - but unfortunately, it just didn't work for me. The texture is great, application is easy, and it sits well on the skin. The formulation just did not work well for my skin type (sensitive) and I broke out and my skin became more sensitive and reactive. I discontinued use and everything went back to normal. I believe it was the niacinamide in the formula, as my skin sometimes reacts poorly to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this SPF! The consistency is super thin which means it spreads and disappears on the skin with almost no effort. I would honestly like the consistency to be a little bit thicker because I find some of it drips out of my hands before I even get it to my face. It doesnu2019t make me break out and I donu2019t notice any scent/smell which is great and it leaves my skin feeling hydrated and looking a little dewy! I havenu2019t noticed any pilling under makeup either. Overall I will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_title: MY NEWFOUND SECRET TO GLOWING SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product is seriously innovative in the skincare community mixing serum with SPF. super lightweight and leaves my skin looking incredibly glowy. comes in darker packaging to ensure the spf stays active. I do wish that it was unscented as it has a slight rose scent and some people are sensitive to fragrance in skincare. although, i have super sensitive skin and havenu2019t noticed any irritation at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was super lightweight, i have tan skin and i also didnu2019t have any type of white cast left on my skin after rubbing this sunscreen in. I find that it doesnu2019t leave my skin too greasy either to the point where it looks oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the new formula the ultra violette sunscreen is very lightweight, easy to blend into the skin with a very nice nice natural glow, it worked well with my skin type and does not leave a white coast or peels off.

reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen, I use it everyday. Itu2019s super lightweight and doesnu2019t leave a white cast at all. Love supporting Australian brands ud83eudd1eud83cudffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. I think it leaves my skin feeling so beautiful and protects me for the fun beach days. Itu2019s been my go to recently and I love the brand. They have really good products. I also really like their lip balm SBF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Queen SPF 50+ Ultraviolet Skinscreen offers stellar sun protection with a lightweight, non-greasy formula. It blends seamlessly, leaving skin smooth and radiant. Perfect for daily wear! I love it a lot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is so smooth. It feels so silky on the skin and doesnu2019t leave white caste. Packaging is so unique n different than the sunscreen lotions. It makes wonder to my skin and I am loving this sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've finally found my holy grail sunscreen with Fave Fluid SPF50+ Ultralight SKINSCREEN! As someone with sensitive skin, finding a sunscreen that not only protects but feels weightless and doesn't leave a greasy residue has been a game-changer. The texture is truly ultralight, almost like wearing nothing at all, yet it offers robust SPF 50+ protection against both UVA and UVB rays. It absorbs quickly, doesn't clog pores, and works beautifully under makeup. Plus, it's fragrance-free, which is perfect for my skin. I can confidently say this is the best sunscreen I've ever usedu2014effective, gentle, and a pleasure to apply daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I previously became acquainted with this Austrian brand thanks to their lip glosses, and now Iu2019ve come to this product. It has a very pleasant texture, not sticky. It is not visible on the skin and does not create a mask effect. I apply it before makeup and it goes on well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sunscreen from Australia truly delivers on its promises of a weightless texture and invisible coverage. The formulation is remarkably light, almost like applying a second skin that effortlessly blends into the skin without leaving any greasy residue. This makes it perfect for daily wear, especially under makeup.  What sets this sunscreen apart is its ability to provide effective sun protection without the heavy feeling typically associated with sunscreens. It absorbs quickly and doesn't clog pores, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.   The invisible coverage aspect is impressive; it doesn't leave a white cast or interfere with the application of makeup, which is a huge plus for those who prefer a natural look. The sunscreen seamlessly integrates into your skincare routine, ensuring you stay protected from harmful UV rays without compromising on comfort or appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This sunscreen applies so lightly and feels good on the skin right away. The consistency is super lightweight. It doesnu2019t leave a white cast. I really enjoyed using it. Itu2019s a great Australian sunscreen!

reviews.review_text: When trying out a new sunscreen, I find it difficult to find one that works well with makeup on top of it. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is my new absolute favorite! The texture is liquid and super thin, it feels like nothing on the skin. And no white cast either.  It has a very nice dewy finish and it doesn't clog my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recently had the chance to try Ultra Violette Fave Fluid Ultralight Screen SPF50+. A sunscreen so weightless you'll forget you're wearing it! This sunscreen is Australian-made and tested. I love wearing this every day, definitely a must have for summer! Review: Lightweight yet Effective: The first thing that struck me was the texture - it's incredibly lightweight and non-greasy. You barely notice you're wearing sunscreen! The formula is also surprisingly thin, making it a breeze to apply evenly across your face and body. The ultralight consistency allows for seamless absorption into the skin, leaving no residue behind. SPF50+ Protection: Now, about the all-important SPF aspect - I'm happy to report that this sunscreen delivers on its promise! With an impressive SPF50+ rating, you can trust it will provide reliable protection against UVA and UVB rays. The Fave Fluid Ultralight Screen is perfect for daily use, whether you're lounging by the pool, hiking in the mountains, or simply running errands. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Excellent for Sensitive Skin and Eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great sunscreen for those of us with not only sensitive skin but also sensitve eyes. I like to put spf on the skin around my eyes if I can, because doesn't that skin deserve protection too? Most sunscreens I can't do it though because they'll make my eyes water, even some mineral ones. Not this one though - I can put it around my eyes (carefully) and don't notice it for the rest of the day! As for the rest of my face, it is causing no irritation or breakouts whatsoever, and my skin feels very soft. It does come out of the bottle pretty watery, but once I figured out how to apply it without making a complete mess, it's perfect. At first it applies very shiny and sticky, but once it dries it is more natural looking and feels like you don't have anything on. Also love that it has 75 ml which is more than most that have 50 ml. This is definitely going to be a staple sunscreen for me going forward, definitely recommend trying it if you have sensitive skin/eyes and if you don't like feeling your sunscreen on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this sunscreen! As someone who prefers light and more liquid textures rather than rich creams, this was perfect. It doesnu2019t leave a white cast and I didnu2019t have to reapply throughout the day since it lasted so long. I have sensitive skin so Iu2019m always careful with facial SPFs but this was super gentle. I would definitely recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is next level! I am always so skeptical of facial sunblocks because I find that they either do not protect well enough or I need to reapply them 4/5 times while in the sun. This one is ultra lightweight and feels more like a serum on your face rather than a thick sun cream and although it is white, it doesnu2019t leave a harsh white cast on my skin. I have 2/3 spf that I cycle through but Iu2019ve been reaching for this one every time lately because  of how well it protected my skin while on a beach during a UV 9+ day. I reapplied once I came out of the water and it did an amazing job of protecting my skin. It is an Australian brand so it is tested under some of the harshest sun and it shows! Would definitely recommend this to anyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ultra Violette is an Australian made and tested brand! The Fave Fluid Ultralight Screen SPF50+ is lightweight, absorbs quickly, and feels great on my skin. It leaves no greasy residue, and it provides excellent sun protection. I use this as a moisturizer before my makeup routine and my skin and makeup look and feel amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fave Fluid - A Sunscreen So Weightless You'll Forget You're Wearing It Fave Fluid truly lives up to its promise. This sunscreen is incredibly light, absorbing quickly without any greasy residue. Its weightless formula feels almost invisible on the skin, making it perfect for daily use. Ideal for all skin types, it offers robust protection without clogging pores or causing breakouts. An essential addition to any skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Paula's Choice has hit the mark again with their Fave Fluid SPF50 Ultralight Skinscreen, offering a stellar option for daily sun protection. As someone with combination skin prone to breakouts, finding a sunscreen that doesn't feel heavy or greasy can be a challenge. This product, however, lives up to its name by delivering an exceptionally lightweight formula that absorbs effortlessly into the skin.  The texture is notably smooth and non-greasy, making it perfect for wearing under makeup without any pilling or residue. It provides broad-spectrum SPF50 protection, which is essential for shielding against both UVA and UVB rays. What sets it apart is its blend of antioxidants, including vitamin E, which helps to fend off environmental aggressors and maintain skin health.  I particularly appreciate the absence of fragrance and essential oils, which can be irritating to sensitive skin. Instead, this sunscreen feels gentle and soothing upon application. It doesn't clog pores or cause breakouts, making it suitable for those with acne-prone skin like mine.  In terms of wear, it holds up well throughout the day, maintaining its protective barrier without the need for frequent reapplication. The packaging is practical and travel-friendly, featuring a sleek pump dispenser that dispenses just the right amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the most lightweight sunscreen I've ever used. It literally feels like water shaking it in the bottle. I love an SPF over 50 and keeps my skin looking young throughout the summer. Going to try and wear sunscreen in the winter more too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve seen Ultra Violetteu2019s products on the shelves of my local Sephora lately u2013 their packaging is bright and oh-so-eyecatching, so I started researching them some more. Theyu2019re a suncare brand out of Australia, which is also where their products are made and tested. I always like using products that come from places with rigorous standards and it makes total sense to be using suncare from Australia. The applicator is a fine tip dispenser, which is great since the consistency of this is very thin and runny, so you really want a way to control the flow. I apply this in the mornings, after my moisturizer but before my makeup. Since this dries down to an almost powdery-light finish, itu2019s very easy to apply my concealer and foundation over top. As opposed to a silicone-based u2018invisibleu2019 sunscreen, you truly donu2019t even feel this on your skin, itu2019s that lightweight. It also contains niacinamide, so it works to treat your skin while also providing broad spectrum SPF protection. The scent is barely detectable and only when it first comes out of the bottle, dissipating quickly. Honestly if I didnu2019t know that I had applied this, I wouldnu2019t know that I was wearing sunscreen. It also doesnu2019t leave my skin looking dried out like some other facial sunscreens I've tried u2013 it actually seems to add moisture and make my skin look more alive and moist to the touch. Now that Iu2019ve discovered this, I canu2019t see myself going back to anything else u2013 it's made it so easy and uncomplicated to incorporate SPF protection into my daily routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a chance to try out the @ultravioletteau Fave Fluid Ultralight Screen SPF50+ from @skeepers_us for free in exchange for my honest review.   Since I have medium-brown skin, it's always super difficult to find a sunscreen that doesn't leave a white cast AND one that works for my combo skin! I was super excited to try this out and use it in my daily skincare routine.   This sunscreen is extremely ultralight, weightless, and in a fluid texture. It's very liquidity, which allows it to blend into the skin. It feels like you have nothing on! It's invisible and doesn't leave me greasy or sticky.  I used this daily for several days and found that it doesn't break me too!   Not only does this sunscreen provide SPF protection, but it is made with next-gen UV filters and an impressive combination of skin-loving ingredients like Pentavitin, Niacinamide and Vitamin C! I love how you get multiple skincare benefits while using this product.   A huge plus is that it is also free of parabens, phthalates, oxybenzone, artificial fragrances, sulfates, SLS, and SLES. It is also cruelty-free!   This sunscreen is proudly made in Australia, which is literally known for their harsh sun environment. So, I know for a fact that this sunscreen was made considering extreme measures. Once I run out, I'll definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Fave Fluid SPF50+ Ultralight SkinScreen every day,  for the past week and  I must say it's awesome. The ultralight, weightless texture feels great on my skin and doesn't leave any greasy residue. It blends in perfectly with an invisible finish, so no white cast, which is especially great for darker skin tones like myself. Adding this to my routine has been easy, just to a layer after moisturizing, and Iu2019m set it blend so easily. Plus, it's Australian-made and tested, so I trust its quality.it's a fantastic sunscreen that's perfect for everyone! I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this amazing sunscreen from Skeepers and Ultra Violette for review.  I am in love with this Favourite Fluid Ultralight screen because of many reasons:  It is SPF/FPS 50+, broad spectrum It has lotion type consistency so its not sticky  It doesnu2019t leave white cast  It is combination of skincare and sunscreen  I have been using this screen for about two weeks and I found that it is so hydrating for my dry skin  I apply it on my face as last step after make up whenever I go out  It needs to be reapplied after every two hours in sun  This screen is made in Australia  It is cruelty free and paraben free

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is very lightweight on the skin and is perfect for the summer. I love that there is not an oily look too it. This sunscreen is made and tested in Australia which is very cool! I use this everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Australian-made sunscreen is a dream come true for anyone who loves a weightless, ultralight feel on their skin. It absorbs instantly, leaving behind a completely invisible finish that feels like you're wearing absolutely nothing. That's perfect for me, because I hate when things feel heavy or greasy on my skin. It also has no white cast which is amazing! This sunscreen is a staple in my daily skincare routine and the perfect last step and I love the way it feels on my skin while also protecting it. Overall, if you're looking for a weightless, invisible sunscreen that delivers serious hydration, this is a must-try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is a must have sunscreen!! It is super light weight!! I also love how this product has niacinamide it helps with my uneven skin tone! It also gives an amazing glow and gives an intense hydration to ur skin!!

Tru00e8s belle cru00e8me solaire incroyable pour la peau et elle possu00e8de une tru00e8s bonne texture je lu2019applique avant mon maquillage et elle est incroyable car elle ne lu2019a fait pas Peller je vous la recomende elle est incroyable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never tried this brand before but I took it with me for a beach day and tried it and honestly at first it felt kinda sticky but it dried and I couldnu2019t feel anything anymore. I like that itu2019s more watery because itu2019s easier to put on my face and rubs in way better than regular sunscreen. You donu2019t need to use much but definitely gonna reapply and use this sunscreen everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily skin especially after putting on sunscreen. The sunscreens I have tried always left me feeling greasy and messed up my makeup. This one is so light and weightless that I barely feel like I have anything on my face. I use it a couple of minutes after my moisturizer so it doesn't mix with other products and loose some of its properties. This sunscreen was made to protect against the harsh Australian sun so I can feel confident and safe using it on sunny days.  The only downside is that it sometimes make my eyes water if I'm particularly  sweaty.  Thank you Ultra Violette for giving me the opportunity to try this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great sunscreen! As someone who spends alot of time on hot islands, I struggle to find sunscreens that donu2019t dry out my skin. This light + weightless sunscreen leaves me with a fresh and covered feeling. This sunscreen is Australian made + tested, proving to work on the sunniest of days. I canu2019t wait to try more of Ultra Violetteu2019s products after loving this so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A gorgeous lightweight liquid formula that sinks into the skin effortlessly and feels great! Finally, a new gen sunscreen/Aussie BFF that is available in North America! I canu2019t wait to try their other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Ultra Violet 50 SPF sunscreen is my go-to for daily sun protection. Its super light and smooth texture makes it easy to apply without feeling heavy on my skin. It blends in really well, leaving my skin looking natural and not shiny at all. I use this sunscreen every day as part of my skincare routine. It's made in Australia and they test it thoroughly to make sure it works well. It feels good to support a local product that's made with care.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried their supreme facial sunscreen and loved it. But for summer I love this one more! It is lighter and has more of a runny consistency like the Asian sun milks. High SPF, lightly scented and no white cast. This is a win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for a few weeks now. Has not broken me out. Super lightweight and gives a really nice glow before makeup. Also no pilling. Overall best sunscreen Iu2019ve ever used on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just switched over to this new sunscreen as my everyday under make up base layer. It goes on so smoothly and creates a great base for an everyday look that also gives me really good sun spf protection!

reviews.review_title: A must in your skin care routine
reviews.review_text: As someone with easily congested skin, finding the perfect sunscreen has been a game-changer, and this product is it! It's incredibly lightweight, gliding on effortlessly like water, which makes application a breeze. What I love most is its invisible skin finish u2013 it blends in seamlessly without any white cast, making it ideal for everyday wear under makeup or alone. The fact that it's totally free from fragrance is a huge plus for me, ensuring no irritation. Whether you have normal, combination, or sensitive skin like mine, this sunscreen ticks all the boxes for protection and comfort. Highly recommend!

This product is incorporated into my everyday routine of applying sunscreen before heading out to protect my face and neck from the UV rays. I feel projective over my skin when I apply this and head outside.

reviews.review_title: Love it! The perfect facial SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know it's an impossible task to please everyone - but this sunscreen might be the closest to perfect that I have tried (and I have tried many and spent lots of money doing it). This product is so light and easy to apply - I have not noticed any pilling, and it hasn't irritated my skin or caused any breakouts. I had a hard time deciding which Ultra Violette formulation to go with, and I'm glad I chose this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love that there is finally a sunscreen in the market that is suitable under makeup, for combo-oily skin types! the fluid texture of this makes it sink really quick to the skin

reviews.review_title: My favourite of all the Ultra Violette Skinscreens
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an Aussie girl who lives in Canada, and have been using Ultra Violette sunscreens for years now!  The filters that they use (like Tinosorb S and M) feel way better on my skin than the North American ones, and it honestly just feels like skincare. Fav Fluid is my go to from their skinscree lineup,  as it's lightweight and leaves my skin looking just that little bit dewy. It doesn't sting my eyes, and feels comfortable enough to wear all day under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ultra Violette has been a favourite of mine for a couple years now and I'm happy I don't have to order it from Australia anymore! I know the formulation changed a little when they started selling at Sephora Canada and since I still have the Australian version I wanted to see how they compare and they are nearly identical. The Canadian version might have a slightly less dewy finish which I actually prefer, but in general it's just an A+ lightweight sunscreen that works well under my makeup. It's a very thin, milky formula so getting the right amount for your face might be a little tricky but that's the only trouble I have with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my fave sunscreens. One of the few that doesnu2019t burn my eyes non greasy but hydrating. I always have a bottle of this. Make sure skin routine is simple + wait a few minutes or else it can peel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my FAVORITE sunscreen ever, it is truly sooooo lightweight and feels like a serum. It's very liquidy and doesn't leave a thick, greasy residue leftover after blending in. It leaves your skin looking hydrated and dewy, but not greasy. It is a bit shiny for my oily skin but I just use a bit of powder to tone down the shine and it's perfect for day to day wear. It works well with makeup too! I find if I use too many products before applying this then it can have some pilling issues, but if you keep it simple (I only use toner and vitamin C before this) then there are no issues with pilling at all. Makeup applies nicely on top of this and it never irritates my sensitive skin :) Absolutely love this sunscreen and highly recommend to everyone for a daily wear SPF

reviews.review_title: Best face sunscreen I have ever used!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most lightweight and easily blend-able sunscreen. It has no white cast, gives a beautiful + natural glow and also looks amazing by itself and under makeup. All of this while being completely cleaned. non-comedogenic, reef-safe and vegan
